subject: Web3
title: Ethereum's Token Standard: ERC-20
description: A quick win: understand Ethereum's Token Standard: ERC-20.

hook.text: Anyone can create a new cryptocurrency on Ethereum in minutes. A standard called ERC-20 makes it possible.

buildup.text: ERC-20 defines a common set of rules: how tokens are transferred, how balances are checked, how approvals work.

discovery.text: Because all ERC-20 tokens follow the same rules, every wallet and exchange can support them automatically.

twist.text: The ease of creating tokens led to thousands of scam coins. Anyone could mint a token and sell it.

climax.text: ERC-20 tokens power stablecoins, governance tokens, and DeFi. Tether and USDC are both ERC-20 tokens.

punchline.text: One standard let anyone create a currency. Thousands did.

quiz.question: What is ERC-20?
options: A standard for creating tokens on Ethereum
